library.description: Javascript lacks complete string manipulation operations. This an attempt to fill that gap. List of build-in methods can be found for example from Dive Into JavaScript.
library.name: Underscore String

library.description: XRegExp is an open source (MIT License) JavaScript library that provides augmented, extensible regular expressions. You get new syntax, flags, and methods beyond what browsers support natively. XRegExp is also a regex utility belt with tools to make your client-side grepping simpler and more powerful, while freeing you from worrying about pesky cross-browser inconsistencies and the dubious lastIndex property.
library.name: XRegExp

library.description: string.js, or simply S is a lightweight (< 4k minified and gzipped) JavaScript library for the browser or for Node.js that provides extra String methods. Originally, it modified the String prototype. But I quickly learned that in JavaScript, this is considered poor practice.
library.name: String.js

library.description: sprintf.js is a complete open source JavaScript sprintf implementation.
library.name: sprintf.js

library.description:
Generate of so called "static" or "Clean URL" or "Pretty URL" or "nice-looking URL" or "Speaking URL" or "user-friendly URL" or "SEO-friendly URL" or "slug" from a string. 

This module aims to transliteration the input string.

For use in browser and server - no dependencies!

Installation:

npm install speakingurl --save

bower install speakingurl 

jam install speakingurl

or CDN

https://npmjs.org/package/speakingurl
library.name: speakingurl

library.description: A collection of utility functions for working with strings in JavaScript in the browser or CommonJS.
library.name: Slang

library.description: Stringify an object/array like JSON.stringify just without all the double-quotes. Useful for when you want to get the string representation of an object in a formatted way.
library.name: stringify-object

library.description: Detect the indentation of some code. Useful if you need to persist indentation or have new content match existing indentation.
library.name: detect-indent

library.description: Library which transforms your text input into typographically correct sequence of characters.
library.name: Tipograph

library.description: turns content (in)visible w/ Unicode's ZWJ and ZWNJ.
library.name: z.js

library.description: sprintf() for JavaScript is a complete open source JavaScript sprintf implementation.
library.name: sprintf()

library.description: Fast and correct clip functions for HTML and plain text
library.name: text-clipper
